options.content:
ClarionChain

Bitcoin

targets.rawSql: SELECT height as "Block", pool as "Pool" FROM cc_getblockpool ORDER BY height DESC LIMIT 1;

WITH CurrentHeightInfo AS (
  SELECT
    MAX(height) AS current_height
  FROM
    cc_getblockstats
),
HalvingInfo AS (
  SELECT
    current_height,
    ((FLOOR(current_height / 210000) + 1) * 210000) - current_height AS "blocks_until_halving"
  FROM
    CurrentHeightInfo
),
TimeUntilHalving AS (
  SELECT
    current_height,
    blocks_until_halving,
    blocks_until_halving * 10 * 60 AS "time_until_halving_seconds" -- 10 minutes per block in seconds
  FROM
    HalvingInfo
)
SELECT
  TO_TIMESTAMP(
    EXTRACT(
      EPOCH
      FROM
        NOW()
    ) + time_until_halving_seconds
  ) AS Halving_Estimate
FROM
  TimeUntilHalving;

targets.rawSql: SELECT MAX(value) AS "All Time High" FROM cm_btc_price_usd_1d;
SELECT "time", value as "Realized Cap" FROM cm_realized_cap_1d order by time desc limit 1;
SELECT "time", avgfeerate as "Avg Sats/vB" FROM cc_getblockstats order by height desc limit 1;

WITH Epochs AS (
    SELECT
        "time",
        height,
        FLOOR((height - 1) / 2016) AS epoch
    FROM
        cc_getblockstats
    ORDER BY
        height
),
EpochIntervals AS (
    SELECT
        epoch,
        MIN("time") AS start_time,
        MAX("time") AS end_time,
        MIN(height) AS start_block,
        MAX(height) AS current_block,
        COUNT(*) AS block_count
    FROM
        Epochs
    GROUP BY
        epoch
),
CurrentEpoch AS (
    SELECT
        MAX(epoch) AS current_epoch
    FROM
        Epochs
),
CurrentEpochDetails AS (
    SELECT
        (ei.end_time - ei.start_time) / (ei.block_count - 1) AS "Avg Block Time"
    FROM
        EpochIntervals ei
    INNER JOIN
        CurrentEpoch ce ON ei.epoch = ce.current_epoch
)
SELECT
    "Avg Block Time"
FROM
    CurrentEpochDetails;
SELECT "time", height as "Height" FROM cc_getblockstats order by height desc limit 1;

SELECT (height / 2016 + 1) * 2016 AS "Next Diff Adjustment Height"
FROM cc_getblockstats
ORDER BY height DESC
LIMIT 1;
SELECT "time", difficulty as "Difficulty" FROM cc_getblockchaininfo order by time desc limit 1;
SELECT height as "Height" FROM cc_gettxsetoutinfo order by height desc limit 1;

SELECT
  SUM(subsidy)/100000000.0 AS "Total Bitcoin Mined"
FROM
  cc_getblockstats;
SELECT txouts "UTXO Count" FROM cc_gettxsetoutinfo order by height desc limit 1;
SELECT transactions as "Txs in UTXO Set" FROM cc_gettxsetoutinfo order by height desc limit 1;
SELECT disk_size "UTXO Set Size on Disk" FROM cc_gettxsetoutinfo order by height desc limit 1;
SELECT "time", "NVTAdj" as "NVT" FROM cm_nvtadj_1d LIMIT 1;
SELECT "time", height as "Height" FROM cc_getblockstats order by height desc limit 1;

WITH CurrentHeight AS (
    SELECT MAX(height) AS current_height FROM cc_getblockstats
)
SELECT
    FLOOR(current_height / 210000)+1 AS "Epoch"
FROM
    CurrentHeight;

SELECT
  "time",
  ROUND(subsidy/100000000.0, 3) AS "Subsidy"
FROM
  cc_getblockstats
ORDER BY
  height DESC
LIMIT 1;

WITH CurrentHeight AS (
    SELECT MAX(height) AS current_height FROM cc_getblockstats
),
HalvingInfo AS (
    SELECT
        current_height,
        FLOOR((current_height / 210000) + 1) * 210000 AS next_halving_height
    FROM
        CurrentHeight
)
SELECT
    next_halving_height - current_height AS "Blocks to Halving"
FROM
    HalvingInfo;
SELECT MAX(value) AS "All Time High" FROM cm_btc_price_usd_1d;

SELECT
  SUM(subsidy)/100000000.0 AS "Total Bitcoin Mined"
FROM
  cc_getblockstats;

WITH CurrentHeight AS (
    SELECT MAX(height) AS current_height FROM cc_getblockstats
),
HalvingInfo AS (
    SELECT
        current_height,
        FLOOR((current_height / 210000) + 1) * 210000 AS next_halving_height
    FROM
        CurrentHeight
)
SELECT
    next_halving_height - current_height AS "Blocks Until Halving"
FROM
    HalvingInfo;

WITH CurrentHeightInfo AS (
    SELECT MAX(height) AS current_height FROM cc_getblockstats
),
HalvingEpochInfo AS (
    SELECT
        current_height,
        FLOOR(current_height / 210000) AS current_epoch,
        FLOOR(current_height / 210000) * 210000 AS start_of_current_epoch,
        (FLOOR(current_height / 210000) + 1) * 210000 AS start_of_next_epoch
    FROM
        CurrentHeightInfo
),
EpochProgress AS (
    SELECT
        current_height,
        current_epoch,
        start_of_current_epoch,
        start_of_next_epoch,
        (current_height - start_of_current_epoch) AS blocks_into_current_epoch,
        start_of_next_epoch - start_of_current_epoch AS blocks_per_epoch,
        ((current_height - start_of_current_epoch) / (start_of_next_epoch - start_of_current_epoch)::float) * 100 AS percent_complete
    FROM
        HalvingEpochInfo
)
SELECT
    current_epoch + 1 AS halving_epoch, -- Adjusting epoch numbering to start from 1
    TRUNC((percent_complete * 100) + 0.5) / 100 AS percent_complete -- Manual rounding to 2 decimal places
FROM
    EpochProgress;
SELECT "time", height as "Height" FROM cc_getblockstats order by height desc limit 1;

WITH epoch_details AS (
    SELECT
        MAX(height) AS current_height,
        MAX(height) % 2016 AS blocks_into_epoch,
        2016 AS epoch_length
    FROM
        cc_getblockstats
)
SELECT

    (CAST(blocks_into_epoch AS FLOAT) / epoch_length) * 100 AS percentage_complete
FROM
    epoch_details;

WITH epoch_details AS (
    SELECT
        MAX(height) % 2016 AS blocks_into_epoch,
        2016 AS epoch_length
    FROM
        cc_getblockstats
)
SELECT
    (CAST(blocks_into_epoch AS FLOAT) / epoch_length) * 100 AS percentage_complete
FROM
    epoch_details;
SELECT "time", value as "Price Daily" FROM cm_btc_price_usd_1d order by time;
SELECT "time", avgfeerate as "AvgFeeRate" FROM cc_getblockstats order by height desc limit 144;
SELECT "time", total_size as "Block Size" FROM cc_getblockstats ;

SELECT
  DATE_TRUNC('day', TO_TIMESTAMP("time")) AS day,
  AVG(total_size) AS "Average Block Size"
FROM
  cc_getblockstats
GROUP BY
  DATE_TRUNC('day', TO_TIMESTAMP("time"))
ORDER BY
  day;
SELECT "time", height "Height" FROM cc_getblockstats order by height desc limit 144;

SELECT
  to_timestamp("time") AS "Time",
  EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (to_timestamp("time") - LAG(to_timestamp("time")) OVER (ORDER BY height))) AS "Interval"
FROM
  cc_getblockstats
ORDER BY
  height DESC
LIMIT 144;
SELECT "time", (totalfee/100000000.0) as "Fees" FROM cc_getblockstats order by height desc limit 1;
SELECT (subsidy/100000000.0) as "Subsidy" FROM cc_getblockstats order by height desc limit 1;
SELECT "time" as "Time", value as "Hashrate" FROM cm_btc_hashrate_1d;
SELECT "time" as "Time", value as "Hashrate" FROM cm_btc_hashrate_1d;
SELECT "time" as "Time", value as "Difficulty" FROM cm_difflast_1d;
SELECT "time", value as "Price" FROM cm_btc_price_usd_1d;
SELECT "time", value as "CapMrktCurUSD" FROM cm_market_cap_current_1d
SELECT "time", value as "CapRealUSD" FROM cm_realized_cap_1d

WITH btc_market_cap_diff_data AS (
  SELECT
    "time",
    "CapMrktCurUSD" - LAG("CapMrktCurUSD", 1) OVER (ORDER BY "time") AS btc_market_cap_diff
  FROM cm_market_cap_current_1d
),
realized_market_cap_data AS (
  SELECT
    "time",
    "CapRealUSD" AS realized_market_cap
  FROM cm_realized_cap_1d
),
realized_market_cap_diff_data AS (
  SELECT
    "time",
    realized_market_cap - LAG(realized_market_cap, 1) OVER (ORDER BY "time") AS realized_market_cap_diff
  FROM realized_market_cap_data
),
delta_data AS (
  SELECT
    b."time",
    b.btc_market_cap_diff - r.realized_market_cap_diff AS delta
  FROM btc_market_cap_diff_data b
  JOIN realized_market_cap_diff_data r ON b."time" = r."time"
)
SELECT
  "time",
  CASE
    WHEN STDDEV(delta) OVER (ORDER BY "time" ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) = 0 THEN NULL
    ELSE (delta - AVG(delta) OVER (ORDER BY "time" ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW))
         / STDDEV(delta) OVER (ORDER BY "time" ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW)
  END AS gradient
FROM delta_data;

WITH btc_price_diff_data AS (
  SELECT
    "time",
    "PriceUSD" - LAG("PriceUSD", 1) OVER (ORDER BY "time") AS btc_price_diff
  FROM cm_btc_price_usd_1d
),
realized_price_data AS (
  SELECT
    "time",
    "CapRealUSD" / 21000000 AS realized_price
  FROM cm_realized_cap_1d
),
realized_price_diff_data AS (
  SELECT
    "time",
    realized_price - LAG(realized_price, 1) OVER (ORDER BY "time") AS realized_price_diff
  FROM realized_price_data
),
delta_data AS (
  SELECT
    b."time",
    b.btc_price_diff - r.realized_price_diff AS delta
  FROM btc_price_diff_data b
  JOIN realized_price_diff_data r ON b."time" = r."time"
)
SELECT
  "time",
  CASE
    WHEN STDDEV(delta) OVER (ORDER BY "time" ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) = 0 THEN NULL
    ELSE (delta - AVG(delta) OVER (ORDER BY "time" ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW))
         / STDDEV(delta) OVER (ORDER BY "time" ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW)
  END AS gradient
FROM delta_data;
SELECT "time", value FROM cm_market_cap_current_1d;
SELECT "time", value FROM cm_realized_cap_1d;

WITH btc_market_cap_diff_data AS (
  SELECT
    "time",
    "value" - LAG("value", 1) OVER (ORDER BY "time") AS btc_market_cap_diff
  FROM cm_market_cap_current_1d
),
realized_market_cap_data AS (
  SELECT
    "time",
    "value" AS realized_market_cap
  FROM cm_realized_cap_1d
),
realized_market_cap_diff_data AS (
  SELECT
    "time",
    realized_market_cap - LAG(realized_market_cap, 1) OVER (ORDER BY "time") AS realized_market_cap_diff
  FROM realized_market_cap_data
),
delta_data AS (
  SELECT
    b."time",
    b.btc_market_cap_diff - r.realized_market_cap_diff AS delta
  FROM btc_market_cap_diff_data b
  JOIN realized_market_cap_diff_data r ON b."time" = r."time"
)
SELECT
  "time",
  CASE
    WHEN STDDEV(delta) OVER (ORDER BY "time" ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) = 0 THEN NULL
    ELSE (delta - AVG(delta) OVER (ORDER BY "time" ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW))
         / STDDEV(delta) OVER (ORDER BY "time" ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW)
  END AS gradient
FROM delta_data;

WITH btc_price_diff_data AS (
  SELECT
    "time",
    "value" - LAG("value", 1) OVER (ORDER BY "time") AS btc_price_diff
  FROM cm_btc_price_usd_1d
),
realized_price_data AS (
  SELECT
    "time",
    "value" / 21000000 AS realized_price
  FROM cm_realized_cap_1d
),
realized_price_diff_data AS (
  SELECT
    "time",
    realized_price - LAG(realized_price, 1) OVER (ORDER BY "time") AS realized_price_diff
  FROM realized_price_data
),
delta_data AS (
  SELECT
    b."time",
    b.btc_price_diff - r.realized_price_diff AS delta
  FROM btc_price_diff_data b
  JOIN realized_price_diff_data r ON b."time" = r."time"
)
SELECT
  "time",
  CASE
    WHEN STDDEV(delta) OVER (ORDER BY "time" ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) = 0 THEN NULL
    ELSE (delta - AVG(delta) OVER (ORDER BY "time" ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW))
         / STDDEV(delta) OVER (ORDER BY "time" ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW)
  END AS gradient
FROM delta_data;
